en-US.name: Advanced Hands
en-US.summary: Practice hands that stump most players
en-US.description: Based on analysis half a million hands played through this skill, this feature will allow you to practice the top 100 hands that most people get wrong

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: Based on analysis of half a million hands played through this still, Advanced Hands lets you practice the top 100 hands that people played incorrectly
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Great, now you can practice the top 100 hands people played wrong by saying Practice Advanced Hands

testingInstructions: After purchasing Advanced Hands, you can say 'Practice Advanced Hands' which will allow you to play the top 100 hands most people play wrong.
